From Regressions to Neural Networks

UNPUBLISHED DRAFT

Written on 2018-02-21 in Stemwede, Germany

$$\newcommand{\ra}{\rightarrow}\newcommand{\lra}{\longrightarrow}$$

The Setting of Supervised Learning

The task of supervised learning is to generate predictions based on example data. We have $X$ a space of observations, and $Y$ a target space of values we want to predict.

A is given by a map $I \lra $
